Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.renderers

Class TuiCardRenderer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.renderers.TuiCardRenderer
public class TuiCardRenderer extends Object
The TuiCardRenderer class is responsible for rendering cards on the TUI.
